article.title: TeleCommunications Systems Wins U.S. Army Contract to Provide Deployable Satellite Solutions
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: TeleCommunications Systems Incorporated (TCS) has received an indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity delivery order with a potential value of $246 million. The delivery order is to the U.S. Army Communications-Electronics Life Cycle Management Command (CECOM LCMC) for its rapidly deployable and highly secure satellite communication access to broadband satellite services.
